children.name: card_alias
children.desc: 商家会员卡的唯一标识

children.name: is_available
children.desc: 会员卡状态：使用中:true 已禁用:false

children.name: grant_type
children.desc: 会员卡类型;3:无门槛卡,2:付费卡,1:规则卡

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['page']=1

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.scrm.card.list', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'1', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

name: list
scenarios: 获取商家会员卡列表，此接口需申请高级权限方可调用。仅支持免签名通讯协议(AccessToken)调用,不支持签名通讯协议(AppId/AppSecret)调用。
